idea: We are a professional business IT & telephony solutions company committed to providing professional service, high-quality solution design, and dependable results. We provide fully managed solutions to improve communications through the use of cutting-edge technology, allowing our clients to benefit from our featured managed IT solutions without the burdens of business process management.
name: AcmaCorp Solutions Pvt Ltd.

idea:
We are an Accredited Energy Auditor firm (EmAEA), empanelled with Bureau of Energy Efficiency (BEE), Ministry of Power, Govt. of India. and with various State Designated Agencies.

We are also empanelled with Energy Efficiency Services Limited (EESL), Ministry of Power for conducting Investment Grade Energy Audits and Implementation support in Industries, Municipalities and Commercial Buildings.

Our team consists of more than 15 Engineers which includes Energy Auditors and Sector Experts (3 Accredited Energy Auditors & 5 Certified Energy Auditors) with proven expertise in energy audits in energy intensive sectors such Thermal Power Plant, DISCOM, Chlor-Alkali, Iron & Steel, Petrochemical, Refinery, Cement, Textile, Railways & Commercial Buildings.

We have conducted more than 500 Audits which include Mandatory & Non-mandatory Energy Audits, M&V Audits and PAT consultancy to the industries.
name: ACTIVE ENERGY OPC PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Carrying the business of manufacturers, importers, suppliers, exporters, buyers, sellers and dealer in prillers, DGS Seals, Mechanical Seal Mechanical Engineering .
name: DGS SEALS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Magalogue is an aggregator of Interior Building Materials solving the problem of architects, designers and contractors by bringing all major categories of the materials used in interiors and exteriors of the structure under one roof. The problems faced by material specifiers in the sense of availability, visibility, accessibility, price point and time are solved by our selection processes. Magalogue brings 85+ subcategories (60 Industries) under the same roof for the projects to complete faster, the designers to get a choice from the market, and decrease the wastage of samples and folders. By bringing in technologies like virtual reality, artificial intelligence and many more we aim to scale the business and solve problems better. Being dealers or channel partners with more than 350+ brands we generate revenue from the sale of materials. Magalogue will also generate revenue through advertisement and sponsorships of brands. Magalogue is well praised in the architects and designers community and on the social media.
name: MAGALOGUE VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
DEWERA was established and registered in 2019 with its corporate office located in Andheri East, Mumbai and Manufacturing Unit at Vasai.

In order to focus on the quality of our product we have an In-house quality control department. With the help of qualified experts from quality control department we ensure the best quality for the products that we deliver to our customers.
name: DEWERA EXIM LLP
